message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,250,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you. I'm confident it will be a great asset to your business. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I can get out of the product.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $900,000 is simply too low.  I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000.  This still leaves some room for you to make a profit, and it's closer to the value you'll get from the product. Let's work together to find a solution that works for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,100,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, and I believe this price is fair considering the product's value to me.

Bob, I understand you're trying to find a price that works for you, but $950,000 is still too low for me.  I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $1,025,000.  This is a fair price that considers both our needs.  If you're serious about buying this product, I believe this is our final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $1,025,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $975,000 for the product. I'm hoping we can come to an agreement at this price.
